trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Tumwater
There was one other sighting in Tumwater on or around June 24th 2010
divs: sighting detailsthursday evening i went out to have a smoke, there was a small plane circling over my residence, for an hour (more or less)...it was late and the plane was noisy..i was wondering why it was flying so low late at night in circles...that alone was unusual, i live a mile away from olympia airport, for the past 13 years, and see planes come and go...this airport is small and it's rare when you see planes flying low late at night...i watched him, and i saw a (what looked like) bright orb fly by, close to the plane..not right next to the plane but to me it appeared to be at the same altitude, maybe a mile away north east of the plane as i was watching it...i wondered if the person\persons in the plane saw it...the object flew into a low dark cloud, and i thought mmmmm wonder if that was a ufo...it was too low to be a satellite,and within less than 10 minutes i saw another one coming from the same general area...this one headed east, i think, and i thought, hmmm is that the same object???i was talking to my adult son in nevada last night about this, telling him that i thought i saw an orb or two the other night...regardless, the only reason i am reporting this is because of the report 23941 in tumwater that i read today...i have seen objects in the past, one very close in tumwater last year...i really don't like advertising because most people do not look up at the sky, and when they do many would just ignore, shake their heads, not even bother to question what they just saw...i have seen many people throughout the years do just that...but to the person who reported this, i live down the hill from you, off of little rock and 70th closer to the airport and the airplane was flying in a circle and over my home...what you saw (whatever it is) was real, and lower than what i think you saw from your vantage point, but it may have climbed in altitude and was of course at a different point when you saw it...and i think there were two orbs, not just one...so now it would be nice if whoever was flying that plane late that night would speak up if he\she saw it too, it was very very close to the plane, and they would have had a great vantage point...
Summary: Saw the same event as described in Tumwater #23941.
